DOC.detailed_description: Obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) common disorder characterize intermittent hypoxia sleep fragmentation . OSA associate cardiovascular morbidity mortality , metabolic dysregulation , neurocognitive dysfunction , may bring bad prognosis . Continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) standard treatment OSA oral appliance surgery alternative treatment . The difference craniofacial feature among race contribute race-specific presentation OSA . Up date , limited study investigate long-term prognosis OSA recruit Caucasians African Americans . Moreover , study n't address impact treatment CPAP long-term prognosis . . National Health Insurance Research Database ( NHIRD ) Taiwan enrol 99 % whole Taiwan 's population longer period 10 year follow-up , suitable investigation long-term prognosis predictor OSA . However , due limit parameter diagnosis treatment , result could bias secondary database research . Center Sleep Disorder National Taiwan University Hospital ( NTUH ) establish 2006 2,600 sleep study annually . Therefore , database cohort sleep center could offer validation prognosis predictor determine NHIRD . In addition , impact three treatment modality , namely CPAP , oral appliance , surgery , long-term prognosis could study prospective way . Therefore , project , aim achieve three goal ( 1 ) To explore long-term prognosis identify predictor Taiwanese OSA patient NHIRD , prediction mode prognosis establish ( 2 ) . To validate prediction model derive NHIRD database NTUH sleep center ( 3 ) To determine effect different treatment long-term prognosis prospective follow NTUH sleep center cohort .
